name: ColorConvertPurpose
shortdesc: Denotes the purpose of color conversion using ConvertSmapleColor method.

property.name: defaultpurpose
property.shortdesc: Do standard conversion, without black preservation.

property.name: previewpurpose
property.shortdesc: Conversion options appropriate to creating an image for screen display.

property.name: exportpurpose
property.shortdesc: Conversion options appropriate to creating an image for print or export.
